cookingMethod.details: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Meanwhile, saut√© pancetta until crispy. Beat eggs and parmesan cheese together. Drain spaghetti and add to pan with pancetta. Remove from heat and pour in egg mixture, stirring constantly until sauce is thick and creamy.

Marinate chicken in yogurt and garam masala for at least 1 hour. Grill or broil chicken until cooked through. Heat tomato sauce in a separate pan. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and add to tomato sauce. Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice and naan bread.
Tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces and toss with croutons and parmesan cheese. Drizzle with Caesar dressing and serve.
